title: JavaScript Basics
description: A quiz to test your knowledge of JavaScript fundamentals.

questions.question: What is the correct syntax for referring to an external script called 'app.js'?
Which method is used to parse a JSON string in JavaScript?

title: CSS Basics
description: A quiz to test your understanding of CSS fundamentals.

questions.question: Which property is used to change the background color of an element?
What is the correct CSS syntax to change the font size of a text to 16px?

title: HTML Basics
description: A quiz to test your understanding of HTML fundamentals.

questions.question: Which HTML element is used to define the largest heading?
Which tag is used to define a hyperlink in HTML?

title: React Basics
description: A quiz to test your understanding of React fundamentals.

questions.question: What is the purpose of 'useState' in React?
Which method is used to render a React component?

title: Node.js Basics
description: A quiz to test your knowledge of Node.js.

questions.question: Which of the following is the default module in Node.js for handling HTTP requests?
Which method is used to create a new HTTP server in Node.js?

title: MongoDB Basics
description: A quiz to test your knowledge of MongoDB.

questions.question: What is the default database in MongoDB?
Which method is used to find a document in MongoDB?

title: Express.js Basics
description: A quiz to test your knowledge of Express.js.

questions.question: Which method is used to define routes in Express.js?
Which middleware function is used to handle POST requests in Express?

title: Git Basics
description: A quiz to test your knowledge of Git.

questions.question: Which command is used to initialize a new Git repository?
Which command is used to view the status of a Git repository?

title: React Router Basics
description: A quiz to test your knowledge of React Router.

questions.question: Which component is used to define a route in React Router?
